pull_request.title: Tiding up
pull_request.body:
Added .gitignore to surpress logs

Created a var to define your name...

added the spanish text dependency (ehem)

You don't use hyperref package and it gives a clash... so I removed it.

And those nasty PDFs... out as well :)

issue.title: Tiding up
issue.body:
Added .gitignore to surpress logs

Created a var to define your name...

added the spanish text dependency (ehem)

You don't use hyperref package and it gives a clash... so I removed it.

And those nasty PDFs... out as well :)

payload.description: Configuration in environment variables and/or with defaults!

commits.message:
"Better" colors + not allow repetition

Even with this fix it's possible, if the color for a project was already
saved, to 2 projects together in the list to have the same background
color.

Split by @ as well

There are timeline messages with references like this one:
company/project@abcd123 to refer to just a commit, this is why we need
to split by @ as well.

Closes #1

issue.title: We should split by `@` as well
issue.body: There are timeline messages with references like this one: `company/project@abcd123` to refer to just a commit. We should split by that as well.

issue.title: We should split by `@` as well
issue.body: There are commit message with references like this one: `company/project@abcd123` to refer to just a commit. We should split by that as well.
